definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[נִסְמָן]] Is 28:25 (si vera l.) barley in an appointed place, or a determined portion (cf. Ges Hi De al.), but ´[[נ]] lacking in LXX and plausibly taken as dittogr. for [[כֻּסֶּמֶת]] by We:Prol. 417; Gesch. Isr. i. 409 Che:Comm. and Hpt. Du; cf. Brd Gu:Kau.
